price: außer Barmherzigkeit von deinem Herrn. Gewiß, Seine Huld zu dir ist ja groß.
arabic: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّ فَضۡلَهُۥ كَانَ عَلَيۡكَ كَبِيرٗا

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: illā raḥmatan min rabbika inna faḍlahu kāna ʿalayka kabīran
